hero.title: Access AI
hero.tagline: Bringing the world to the 4 billion still offline—one community at a time

download.title: Choose Your Platform
download.subtitle: Breaking down technological barriers across all devices. Our mission is to ensure everyone has equal access to information and opportunities.

offline.title: Offline Access
offline.description: Breaking barriers by providing access to essential information without requiring internet connectivity, powered by Microsoft's Phi-4 AI model running directly on your device.

equality.title: Equal Opportunities
equality.description: Empowering communities with equal access to educational resources and opportunities.

community.title: Community Impact
community.description: Creating lasting change by connecting communities to vital resources and knowledge.

join.title: Join the Movement
join.description: Be part of our mission to reduce inequalities and create a more connected world. Access AI brings the power of the internet offline through Microsoft's Phi-4 AI model, downloaded directly to your device. This revolutionary approach ensures access to information even without an internet connection, truly democratizing knowledge access. We're committed to UN Sustainable Development Goal 10, working towards reduced inequalities through technology.

download.title: Download the installer
download.description: Click the download button below to get the Access AI Windows installer.

run.title: Run the installer
run.description: Open the downloaded file (AccessAI-Setup.exe) to start the installation process.

wizard.title: Follow the installation wizard
wizard.description: Accept the license agreement and choose your preferred installation options.

launch.title: Launch Access AI
launch.description: Once installed, you can launch Access AI from your desktop or start menu.

download.alert: This would download the Android version in a real implementation

download.title: Download the APK
download.description: Click the download button below to get the Access AI APK file.

enable.title: Enable unknown sources
enable.description: Go to Settings > Security and enable 'Unknown sources' to allow installation of apps from sources other than the Play Store.

install.title: Install the APK
install.description: Open the downloaded APK file and tap 'Install' when prompted.

launch.title: Launch Access AI
launch.description: Once installed, you can find and launch Access AI from your app drawer.

note.title: Note
note.description: Since this app is not downloaded from the Google Play Store, you'll need to enable installation from unknown sources in your device settings.
